basics.name: Chris Stead
basics.label: Professional Software Developer
basics.summary: Professional web developer and technologist, specializing in client-side middleware and data-driven development

work.summary: Javascript developer and team lead providing architectural and best practices oversight
highlights: Led a team of 7 to build the consumer-facing event registration
Designed and implemented the single page application build system
Introduced code quality tools and techniques to the Javascript team
Worked with team members to develop Javascript TDD skills and improve code and application quality
Performed training, code reviews and programmer development duties
Team worked within a scrum framework and encouraged a collborative development environment
Technologies: Javascript, Angular, REST & CORS, CSS, HTML, Node.js

work.summary: Full stack developer, web development specialist
highlights: Managed code quality of offshore development team
Added test runner support to CI system
Provided training on Javascript unit testing and test frameworks
Built framework components to simplify workflow and improve software quality
Team worked within a scrum framework with regular pair programming
Technolgies: Javascript, Angular, REST & CORS, CSS, HTML, C#, ASP.Net MVC, Node.js

work.summary: Full stack developer, engineering manager and multi-language systems integration engineer
highlights: Planned and built contractor application system improving conversion rates by 400%
Build and supported custom multi-platform CMS reducing site support costs by 80%
Created and supported business and management tools supporting a $2B growth in revenue over 5 years
Technolgies: PHP, Javascript, CSS, HTML, MySQL, Java, C#, ASP.Net

work.summary: Software developer and technical lead, web software focus
highlights: Overhauled site management tool, improving student registration by 20%
Built office tool management and scheduling suite improving asset utilization by 60%
Technologies: PHP, Javascript, CSS, HTML, MySQL

work.summary: Ideator and founder, provided written content as well as platform support; Managed a small team of writers
highlights: Planned designed and released online magazine
Effectively changed technologies when original release technology failed on a cycle
Rebranded and pivoted magazine to maintain relevance in the market
Technologies: PHP, CSS, HTML, MySQL

work.summary: Various early work on the web and in software development
highlights: Blue Bear Software, Software Developer, 2005
Independent Contracts, Web Developer and Consultant, 1998-2000
